title: Silent Is the Night
description: Even the most well-meaning gestures can go horribly wrong. While leaving work just days before Christmas, a man is stopped by a young woman asking for charitable donations. The encounter touches off a vivid recollection of Christmas caroling to shut-ins with the church and asking for donations as a boy. What follows is comic, tragic, and even a little heartwarming.The eBook is available for the Barnes and Noble NOOK and the Amazon Kindle. The print version is available on Amazon and CreateSpace.BN: http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/silen...Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/Silent-Is-Night...
author: Rick Cummings
